content.raw:
Note that with the current setup, we would have a target named `ignition-gazebo0` for the library and `ign-gazebo` for the executable. It might be confusing to know which target refers to which, so I would recommend we name the executable target something like `ign-gazebo-exec`. If we want the final executable file to have the name `ign-gazebo`, we can still make that happen by setting its `OUTPUT_NAME` property, e.g.:

```
ign_add_executable(ign-gazebo-exec main.cc)
set_property(TARGET ign-gazebo-exec PROPERTY OUTPUT_NAME ign-gazebo)
```
content.html:
Note that with the current setup, we would have a target named ignition-gazebo0 for the library and ign-gazebo for the executable. It might be confusing to know which target refers to which, so I would recommend we name the executable target something like ign-gazebo-exec. If we want the final executable file to have the name ign-gazebo, we can still make that happen by setting its OUTPUT_NAME property, e.g.:

ign_add_executable(ign-gazebo-exec main.cc)
set_property(TARGET ign-gazebo-exec PROPERTY OUTPUT_NAME ign-gazebo)
